betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Acquiring the Verdant Heart Amulet
The Verdant Heart Amulet can be upgraded into two distinct items: the Verdant Heart Ring of Sustenance and the Verdant Heart Ring of Regeneration.

Ring of Sustenance: Continuously replenishes your hunger bar (but not saturation), eliminating the need to carry food in your inventory.
Ring of Regeneration: Gradually heals you at a moderate speed, making it easier to handle encounters with tougher monsters.
All three types of Verdant Heart Rings can consume charge to remove negative effects, providing a handy defensive boost.
